short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A widget for melodi, also adds context menu to YouTube links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an easily accessible melodi widget through chrome. It also adds a context menu to YouTube to right click on YouTube links and open them with melodi as music or podcasts.
